title: Official handbook of the Marvel universe
description:
14 volumes : 27 cm
Provides detailed biographies and physical descriptions of all the costumed heroes and villains in Marvel Comics publications
"T+"--Back cover
V. 1. A to Bl -- v. 2. Blackwulf to Crimson Dynamo -- v. 3 -- Cr to El ; Appendix: core continuum designations -- v. 4. Maestro to Ms. Marvel -- v. 8. -- Multiple man to Phoenix force ; Appendix: Olympians: demi-gods, heroes & other Graeco-Roman mythological figures -- v. 9. Photon to Sage -- v. 10. Salem's seven to Speed ; Appendix: Marvel prose novels -- v. 11. Speed demon to Terrible trio ; Appendix: Marvel prose novels, cont. -- v. 12. Terror (Pevely) to Vision (Aarkus) ; Appendix: Time travel -- v. 13. Vision (Victor Shade) to Zaran -- v. 14. Zarothos to Zota; Aboriginal gods Yandroth; Achelous to Mark Grunewald
